Reviews.Content: Great location excellent value for money just returned from Berlin  stayed in Boulevard hotel. It was in an excellent location, the rooms were clean (if a little warm), nice breakfast, friendly  helpful staff - could not ask for more for a short break, we got a special offer when we booked '3 nights for the price of 2' would defintely stay here again
Reviews.Author: Spainshdreamer

Reviews.Content: Good Cheapish Hotel Just returned from a 3 night stay at the Hotel Boulevard. Our party had 1 double room and 1 twin room booked. Our double room was big and spacaious whilst the twin was very small. My review may have changed if we had stayed in the twin but luckily we didnt. Check in went fine, great location near the Zoo station with access to the S and U Bahn. Rooms clean, reception very friendly breakfast OK. No complients from me.Would go back to the Hotel Boulevard.
Reviews.Author: NathanGunn

Reviews.Content: Great location       Another view from terrace
Reviews.Author: Lexx_Naxxx

Reviews.Content: Very good Hotel indeed ! Stayed at the Boulevard from the 25th Oct -28th october. Booked it through my travel agent here for EUR 83 . The hotel was great value, superb location and I really enjoyed my stay here. Here are my views in favour of the hotel and not in favour of..In favour:-Superb location, walking distance from the Zoo Station ( 10 minutes),on the main shopping road where everything is just 2 minutes walk away. Karstadt the department store is opposite and the upmarket KA A VE is just 5 minutes away. Its right next to Kaiser Wilhelm memorial with lots of food stalls around, so no problem absolutely for food.-The hop on hop off tours bus starts right in front of the hotel-Very comfortable rooms, very good toilet, and absolutely nothing to complain about. Tv, safe and minibar in the rooms. -very polite staff at the reception. My tv and safe were not working initially, and they had it fixed by the time I returned from my tour without a second reminder.-Housekeeping services were commendable-great breakfast, no compalints here too.-There is a One Euro shop on the road behind the hotel, just beside the Kaiser Wilhelm memorial with some good buys, I got a couple of red and white italian wines for just a Euro ! A very good Chinese takeway too nearby with a large portion of chicken fried rice or noodles for Eur 2.50 each.Not in favour....-the very slow moving lift, and a tiny one at that-very soft pillows...but except for the minor hickups, I think this is a great value hotel in a superb location !!!!!!An oh, Berlin is a fabulous city. The best amongst all of those I visited - Frankfurt, Cologne, Dusseldorf, Bonn and Munich.... I fel 3 days just wasnt enough to see the sights...
Reviews.Author: vinn_2k

Reviews.Content: Boulevard Hotel - you're welcome We recently stayed in the Hotel Boulevard, Berlin for 1 week. The location is brilliant. For transport, it is near to the Zoo train station, bus stops, and underground. The hotel is very clean and comfortable. The staff are extremely helpful and friendly. They arranged transport for us and even set out a special breakfast table when it was my wifes birthday.The reception, breakfast room, and bar are situated on the 6th floor. They offer an excellent buffet breakfast which sets you up for the day. When you return from your day out, you can sit out on the rooftop terrace and have a pleasant drink and look down over the square at Kaiser Willhelm church.Our room was on the 2nd floor at the front of the hotel. The room was very spacious and was kept very clean by the hotel.The beds were very comfortable. There was a stocked minibar and security safe in the room.When we return to Berlin (because you cannot see it all in 1 week) we will definitely stay at this hotel again. I would recommend it to anyone
Reviews.Author: ICEll

Reviews.Content: Great Location A great location, close to Zoo station and the 100/200 bus which is better than a tourist bus ride through Berlin. The rooms are small and clean, apart from the carpets which have seen better days.Breakfast was good and can be had on the roof top terrace. The staff were very helpful.However... no Air Con in the rooms and we arrived on a very hot day which led to a sleepless night. The room was on the main Ku'Damm and with the window open was very noisy because of the traffic and 'street entertainers/drunks/boy racers.That said, in the morning the reception staff were very helpful and moved us to a room at the back.Overall a clean and convenient place to stay.
Reviews.Author: stevie70

Reviews.Content: loved this hotel we booked this hotel for its location. it is right in the middle of the centre of berlin, you could almost touch the church and zoo station is one block away, from where you can take a train to anywhere in germany. as soon as we arrived we were met at reception by the most friendly smiling man [sorry i didnt get his name] he spoke great english and was most helpfull. the room was great with views onto the main boulevard. the windows were large and opened fully so although there is no air conditioning you can open up the massive windows if you want. the room was clean, it had a mini bar and in the bathroom there was a hairdryer and power shower. the hotel has a 24 hour bar if you want it, and the all you can eat buffet breakfast was great. especially sitting out on the rooftop terrace in the sun watching the world go by below. they had a special of 10 euros while we were there for breakfast which was good value. this was my third visit to berlin and this was the best hotel yet. i cannot fault it. for what we paid [approx 拢50 a night for the room} if i could go back next week i would. we loved the hotel boulevard! and we loved berlin!
Reviews.Author: cazjacko

Reviews.Content: No frills but good spot Very well located on the KuDamn, but the hotel could only provide twins for our group of six. They were all slightly weirdly L-shaped. Saying that, the area is a great spot for exploring Berlin as every train and bus ends up in Zoo.I wouldn't stay again, but if you are on a tight budget this is a clean and handy hotel.
Reviews.Author: Mancunio

Reviews.Content: OK Hotel in great location I stayed in this hotel for 2 nights recently. The staff could not have been nicer and the location was very good, central to everything. However, the rooms are very basic and in need of updating, there is no AC and rooms on the front of the building are very noisy. Breakfast is available for 15 euro but not worth it.
Reviews.Author: Mary42

Reviews.Content: great hotel I stayed there for 4 nights during my visit to berlin and where it's situated is perfect, right on kurfustendamm and situated right next to the kaiser wilhelm church, sitting on the roof balcony on a night having a glass of wine looking over onto the busy street is lovely.i thought the room was quite nice and spacious for a standard 3 * hotel and the bathroom was well equipped as well, it also has a safe as well, so you can put your valuables in there when you go look around the city. the bed was also a quite comfortable as i went with my fiance and shared a double bed.when getting around berlin i mainly used the buses when i was there and it's very reliable and cheap to use, they also come every 10 minutes so that was very good.however i thought on a night time, there wasnt as many nice restaurants, as i saw some on potsdamer platz, so you may have to travel in order to go to someplace nice.but overall i thought the hotel was very nice and i would definitley go stay there again.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Disappointing Well located next to Zoo Station and in the best shopping district of Berlin. Unfortunately that is where the benefits end. The hotel advertised and guarnteed on the booking confirmation that the two rooms we booked would have 'king size beds' only to find that they clearly promise everyone this and both of our parties were both left with twins. The lift from ground level can only take 3 people with no luggage. Clearly a large inconvenience having sometimes lengthy waits for the back-log to clear. The rooms are small and pokey, shower gel was never replaced and daily cleaning was well below par. With so many hotels in this area it is hard to recommend anyone give them their custom.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Enjoyed my stay at The Best Western       Balcony
Reviews.Author: dipso

Reviews.Content: Very good place Very nice hotel and perfectly located to bus/s-bahn/u-bahn/train station.Great breakfast with overview over Berlin (6th floor of hotel).Staff very helpful.Only thing: you have to keep windows closed, otherwise it's quite noisy, and with no air-con rooms can be quite hot...Definitely to reccomend, anyway,
Reviews.Author: lorenzo72

Reviews.Content: helpful staff Nice hotel located in the center of formal west Berlin. Very convenient to take bus 100 or 200 to all the major points of interests. Also close to S-ban and U-ban. Excellent buffet breakfast included in room rate. Very helpful staff brought us a fan and crib. Very quiet if window is closed. Only drawbacks are 1. without air conditioning it can be hot. 2. Parking garage is not attached with hotel.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: stay in the middle of the middle A perfect place to discover the city. Excellent breakfast buffet with a fantastic view down to the main street Kurfuerstendam. Public transportation nearby. A foodwalk away from KaDeWe (Mall) and the Europa Center. Rooms are just standard but clean.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Hilfsbereites Personal, Zentrale Lage, saubere Zimmer       Blick von der Terrasse
